lines.value: michael the brave (, 1558 − 9 august 1601 wis the prince o wallachie 1593-1601 o transylvanie 1599-1600 an o moldavie 1600 the three romanian principalities bein jynt in the form o personal union for a brief time unner his rule
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: during his reign which coincidit wi the lang war thir three principalities formin the territory o present day romanie an moldovae wur ruled for the first time bi a single romanian leader tho the union lastit for less nor sax months
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he is regardit as ane o romanie's greatest naitional heroes
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his rule began in the hairst o 1593 an twa years later the war wi the ottomans startit a conflict in which the prince focht the battle o calugareni considered ane o the maist important battles o his reign
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: awtho the wallachians emerged victorious frae the battle michael wis forced tae retreat wi his troops an wait for aid frae his allies prince sigismund bathory o transylvanie emperor rudolf ii o austrick
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the war continued till a peace finally emerged in januar 1597 but this anerlie lastit for a year an a hauf
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: peace wis again reached in late 1599 when michael wis unable tae continue the war due tae lack o support frae his allies
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1599 michael wan the battle o selimbar an suin entered alba iulia becomin the prince o transylvanie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a few months later michael's troops invadit moldavie an reached its caipital suceava
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the moldavian leader ieremia movila fled tae poland an michael wis declared prince o moldavie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: michael coud no keep the control o aw three provinces an the nobles o transylvanie rose against him alang wi tae a lesser extent the boyars in moldavie an wallachie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: michael allied wi the austrian general giorgio basta defeatit an uprisin bi the hungarian nobility at guraslau
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: immediately efter this basta ordered the assassination o michael which teuk place on 9 august 1601
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: julia eileen gillard born 29 september 1961 wis the 27t prime meenister o australie an leader o the australie labor pairty frae juin 2010 until juin 2013

lines.value: algerie arabic الجزائر al jaza'ir kabyle lezzayer offeecially the fowkdemocratic republic o algerie an aa formally referred tae as the democratic an popular republic o algerie is a kintra in north africae

lines.value: the banner o north korea wis adoptit on september 8 1948 as the naitional banner an ensign

lines.value: the reid starn o communism can be seen on this banner on a white disc
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: north korea haed oreeginally adoptit a taegeukgi follaein unthrildom frae japan wi a taoist yin yang seembol seemilar tae that in the sooth korean banner but later revised its banner tae mair closely reflect that o the ussr
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the banner wis adoptit in 1948 when north korea became an independent communist state
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the traditional korean banner wis reid white an blue
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the kintra retained these colors wi mair prominence gien tae the reid an addit a reid starn on a white disk
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the disk recalls the taegeuk foond on the banner o sooth korea an represents the opposin principles o naitur
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the reid stripe expresses revolutionary tradeetions the reid starn is for communism
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the twa blue stripes staund for sovereignty peace an friendship
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the white stripe seembolizes purity
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a 600-lb 270 kg north korean naitional banner flies frae the warld's lairgest flagpole which is locatit at kijong-dong on the north korean side o the military demarcation line athin the korean demilitarized zone

lines.value: the banner pole is 160m taw

lines.value: thare is a banner for the korean people's army as well as its twa subdeevisions the korean fowks air force an korean fowks navy which follae a common design but wi different colors blue an white for the navy an air force blue an white for the air force
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thare is an a a bannner o the rulin wirker's pairty o korea modeled efter seemilar communist pairty banners an a banner for the supreme commander o the kpa uised bi kim jong il an haes the supreme commander's airms on a reid field

lines.value: the daihatsu consorte wis a sma sedan sauld bi the japanese automaker daihatsu frae 1969 tae 1977

lines.value: it replaced the compagno as daihatsu's bigger sedan

lines.value: initially the consorte wis available ae as a twa door sedan an wi daihatsu's awn 1.0-litre ingine
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1971 publica's 1.2-litre wis addit tae the range

lines.value: in 1973 a fower door sedan version jynt the lineup anerlie tae be dropped for 1974 wi the launch o the daihatsu charmant

lines.value: the seight pronounced variously as s 8 or sayt is a sports caur manufactured as a kit or factory built vehicle bi westfield sportscars
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is based on the familiar lotus seven concept creatit bi colin chapman whose design philosophy wis tae strip a caur design doun tae bare essentials for the ultimate in drivin experiences
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: bar a few visual differences such as a bonnet bulge tae house the lairge ingine it uises the same widebody chassis as the smawer ingined sei
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: all seights ar defined as such bi the pouerplant a v8 ingine
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in kit form they ar ae available frae the factory as a rollin chassis unlike ither westfield kits which can be bought in component form
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the rover v8 ingine pouerplant o the seight ranges frae 3.5 litre units originally sourced frae the rover sd1 tae bored an stroked 5.2 litre units
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: there ar also 3.9 fuel injectit versions which ar currently providit in the factory built vehicles an tvr pouer ingines of 4.2 litres
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: on the whole the v8 is a rover unit an alloy block which is lichter than the cast iron blocks o mony v8s

lines.value: ane example haes been built aroond an alloy version o the chevrolet sma block wi a displacement o 6.6 litres

lines.value: lady angellyca is the lead sangster an co foonder o the spaingie gothic metal baund forever slave

lines.value: then when she wis aichteen years she haes swapped her classic guitar against an electric guitar an began sangin in complete sel taught

lines.value: dreamaker begun whan vocalist elisa martin guitarist albert maroto an drummer jorge saez left dark moor in 2003 due tae muisical differs
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: they wur suin jyned bi seicont guitarist matias sosa an bassist carlos pena an dark moor's umwhile keyboardist roberto camus wha haed left the baund in 2002 offered tae play wi dreamaker but left the baund in a short time an wis replaced bi nino ruiz

lines.value: the mazda navajo wis a 2-door suv introduced in 1991 an mazda's vera first off roader
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: an aa the navajo wis mazda's ae truck based suv
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: available ae as a fower wheel drive twa door vehicle the navajo wis essentially a rebadged ford explorer sport
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis marketit in the unitit states ae as mazda canadae did no want tae mercat an suv
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: aw navajos wur biggit in louisville kentucky whaur the explorer wis biggit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: tae set the twa apairt the navajo haed a different grille taillights an wheels
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: inside it wis even harder tae tell ane frae the ither as seat fabrics typeface on the instrument cluster but the same design an the steerin wheel hub wur the ae apparent differences
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: twa trim levels for the navajo wur affered base an lx
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the base version affered pouer windaes pouer locks an pouer mirrors as standard
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the lx addit features sic as extra interior n an a leather wrapt steerin wheel
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: an optional premium package loadit up the navajo wi luxuries includin air conditionin a stereo seestem wi cassette deck cruise control sport seats wi pouer lumbar adjustment an a pop up/removable muinruif
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a rear wheel drive navajo wis available for 1992 geared towards fowk who liked the sporty image o an suv but did no need fower wheel drive
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: base models wur nou cawed the dx mair in keepin wi the japanese manufacturer's wey o referrin tae thair base versions sic as mazda's awn 626 dx
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: itherwise the navajo chynged sae little that maist o the photography uised in the 1991 brochure wis reuised for the 1992 brochure
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as expectit the 1993 navajo picked up the same mechanical upgrades as the explorer sic as increast pouer for the v6 ingine an fower wheel anti lock brakes

lines.value: unlik the explorer housomeivver the ae ither chynge wis an optional cd player

lines.value: new five spoke alloy wheels for the navajo lx wur the ae chynge for 1994 which wis the navajo's last year

lines.value: sales whaur poor an the navajo wis eventually replaced wi mazda tribute based on the ford escape in 2001 seiven years efter the navajo wis discontinued

lines.value: this airticle is aboot the baund yearning
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: for ither uises see yearning yearning wis an atmospheric doom metal baund frae finland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: durin its career the baund released five studio albums an ane demo the latter bein released while the baund wis still cawed flegeton
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: yearning wis formed in 1994 unner the name flegeton
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the original line up consistit o juhani palomaki on guitars an vocals an toni kristian on drums
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the baund startit tae write their awn muisic an suin tero kalliomaki joined the baund as a guitarist
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: suin efter flegeton made a 4-track tape titled through the desolate lands but it wis niver widely distributit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in julie 1995 flegeton wi a new bass player mr woodland aka petri salo went intae mdm studios tae record their demo the temple of sagal
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the demo received praise frae enthusiasts o melancholy muisic
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it an aa got the attention o the french record company holy records which flegeton contractit wi for twa full length studio albums
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in februar 1996 the baund went intae tico tico studios tae record some new material
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: at this point the baund wis renamed yearning since the baund believed that their auld name didna fit their muisic onymair
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: they an aa recordit the sang autumn funeral durin these sessions
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: autumn funeral appears on the holy records compilation album the holy bible
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: atween september 16 an september 29 1996 yearning recordit their first album with tragedies adorned in tico tico studios
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the album wis ingineered an produced bi ahti kortelainen
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the album wis released on februar 28 1997 an durin the follaein ware the baund wis busy promotin their newly released album an performin live
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the baund went intae the same studio again on october 18 an october 19 1997 tae record a cover o the paradise lost sang eternal which woud appear on a paradise lost tribute album released on holy records
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efterwards yearning did their first european tour in december 1997 an januar 1998
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: they toured alang wi the baunds nightfall an sup
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in august an september 1998 yearning entered tico tico studios again tae record their seicont studio album plaintive scenes
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it woud eventually be released in februar 1999
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the year 1999 woud awso mark the departure o three members guitarist tero kalliomaki bassist mr woodland an flutist an female vocalist lady tiina ahonen
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: they left acause o personal an muisical disagreements
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter several big fechts yearning's line up nou consistit o juhani palomaki handlin vocal guitar bass guitar an keyboard duties while toni kristian wis still on percussion
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the stript line up went intae tico tico studios in mey 2000 tae record their third studio album frore meadow
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: alang wi the change in line up the muisic changed as well takin mair influence frae progressive rock gothic metal an classical muisic
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: frore meadow wis released through holy records on januar 15 2001
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: due tae changes in line up yearning haed tae recruit muisicians tae play live endin up wi matti s on guitar jani loikas on bass an jouni jormanainen jouni huttunen since 2007 on keyboards
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the live line up woud remain unchanged for the next 9 years
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 2001 yearning an aa toured fraunce wi labelmates gloomy grim an misanthrope
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: yearning did no perform actively durin 2002 but new material wis composed an arranged vera carefully durin the time o silence
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ootcome woud result in yearning's fowert studio album evershade
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the album wis recordit durin juin 2003 in astia studios with anssi kippo as a co producer
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: evershade wis released at the end o september 2003
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: yearning performed live twice efter the release o this album ane concert in helsinki an anither in riihimaki the baund's hametoun
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: wi the release o evershade the contract wi holy records came tae an end leavin yearning athoot a record company
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the baund negotiatit wi several labels includin holy records on upcomin releases but mony o these negotiations wur unproductive an nane lead tae a satisfactory result
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: durin this time yearning wis rather inactive performin live anerlie occasionally - partially due tae the fact that the baund's drummer an ither foondin member toni kristian haed developt a serious addiction problem
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: still durin this seemingly quiet period new material wis bein written an contract negotiations wur bein held
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: eventually toni kristian wis replaced wi aki kuusinen an a ane album contract affer frae holy records wis acceptit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: wi a new contract in pocket yearning headit intae d studio in klaukkala finland wi muisical ingineer olli haaranen awso kent as the guitarist for colosseum tae record their fift studio album merging into landscapes
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: recordin teuk place atween mairch 3 an mairch 23 2007
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the album wis mixed bi jarno hanninen an mastered at elektra mastering
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: guest muisicians on the album includit tiina sitomaniemi who sang awso on plaintive scenes an tuukka koskinen lead vocalist o saattue an let me dream
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: merging into landscapes wis released julie 1 2007
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: juhani palomaki dee'd on 15 mey 2010
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: juhani wis the primus motor an the ae remainin full time foondin member o yearning hence the baund nae langer exists efter his daith
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ither members official or live hae decidit no tae perform as yearning nor play yearning material athoot juhani
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ford vedette wis a lairge caur manufactured bi ford france sa in thair factory in poissy frae 1948 tae 1954
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: introduced at the 1948 mondial de l'automobile in paris it wis designed entirely in detroit resemblin contemporary mercury models but featurt the poissy made 2158 cc aquillon sidevalve v8 ingine o ford's flathead ingine faimily the same as in pre war matford caurs
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: on the ither haund the vedette wis the first caur tae featur the new independent front suspension concept developt bi earle s macpherson kent the day as macpherson struts
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: due tae the fact that the poissy factory coud no resume complete automobile production immediately efter the war mony vital components haed still tae be made bi various subcontractors which reportedly haed an adverse effect on the quality o the caur an contributit tae its leemitit popularity
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ower the sax years in production the vedette wis available in several body styles rangin frae the oreeginal 4-door fastback wi rear suicide doors throu the later 4-door saloon a sunliner 4-door landaulet based on the saloon wi a roll doun roof ower the entire cabin a 2-door coupe an based on it the cabriolet decapotable a 2-door convertible
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: unner the direction o the new company preses mr francois lehideux ford france refresht the caur for 1950 an again in 1952 when the caur finally received a ane piece windscreen new interior an bumpers better brakes lairger trunk an a cigarette lichter
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the 1952 mondial de l'automobile an a saw a luxury version o the vedette the ford vendome fittit wi the bigger 3923 cc mistral v8 ingine previously uised in ford france trucks
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: an a debutin in 1952 wis the 5-door 5-seat abeille french for bee estate wi a twa piece tailgate advertised as baith practical wi a payload o 500 kg an comfortable
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: facin unsatisfactory sales results as weel as disruptive strikes at the poissy plant at the turn o the decade ford haed been tryin tae dispose o the factory syne shortly efter the end o the war
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: an opportunity arose in 1954 when henri theodore pigozzi the foonder o the increasingly successfu french automakker simca wis leukin for a new plant tae expand its operations
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ford france wis merged intae simca wi baith the poissy plant an the richts tae aw models manufactured thare includin a newly designed new vedette
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the new caur haed debuted awready in fraunce unner the name o simca vedette but wis sauld as the ford vedette in some mercats includin swaden the netherlands an germany at least till 1956
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the burmese leid (; ; mlcts myanma bhasa is the offeecial leid o burma
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: although the constitution offeecially recognizes it as the myanmar leid maist inglis speakers continue tae refer tae the leid as burmese
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: burmese is the native leid o the bamar an relatit sub ethnic groups o the bamar as well as that o some ethnic minorities in burma like the mon
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: burmese is spaken bi 32 million as a first leid an as a seicont leid bi 10 million particularly ethnic minorities in burma an those in neighbourin kintras
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: burmese is a tonal an pitch register lairgely monosyllabic an analytic leid wi a subject object verb wird order
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is a member o the tibeto burman leid family which is a subfamily o the sino tibetan family o leids
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the leid uises the burmese script derived frae the old mon script an ultimately frae the brahmi script
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: san antonio is a ceety in paraguay locatit in the central depairtment
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it haes been significant syne colonial times as it wis locatit beside the ryal way a road which leads tae the ceety o villeta
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the day it is experiencin great industrial growthe
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: some historians claim that the toun wis begun bi dr gaspar rodriguez de francia 1814-1840 who established a fortress tae defend the paraguayan territory
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ithers say the toun began aroond 1679
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1782 the franciscan missionaries foondit an indian toun in the aurie wi donations o the neighbors o asuncion
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: san antonio mey hae been foondit in 1890 bi the german ceetizen gustavo conrado gotees born conrad gotz in schnabelwald germany
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: san antonio wis important in the war o the triple alliance 1864-1870
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: brazilian troops arrived in its ports en route tae the historical battle o ytororo in december 1868
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter the war san antonio wis empty
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1903 the paraguayan ceetizen agustin quinonez moved thare an promotit the ceety this wis a seicont foondation o the toun
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a few families o french italian german an spainyie oreegins came tae settle
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: san antonio is locatit on the paraguay river latitude 25 38 an langitude 57 63 in the sooth centre 25 km frae the caipital asuncion
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the north it is bordered bi the districts o nemby an villa elisa in the sooth wi ypane in the east wi nemby an in the wast wi the paraguay river
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thare are 17 neighborhuids san francisco mbocayaty pueblo san blas ma auxiliadora naranjaty antigua imagen san jorge acosta nu achucarro cerrito san agustin amanecer las garzas la merced cerrito an achucarro
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the river haes an impact on the wather makin the nichts an early mornins fresh an the days vera het
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: temperatures range atween in simmer an in winter atween
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: on mairch 16 1981 san antonio wis ascendit tae the category o ceety
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: its first mayor wis francisco bogado caballero
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: on aprile 21 1903 the senate an the congress issued a law declarin the community a destrict
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the ceety thare are a great variety o trees sic as the tajy or lapacho trebol pine eucalyptus cedar laurel an palm

lines.value: the maist important forest reservation is the parque ytororo
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: mair than 50% o the population is atween 15 an 45 years o age

lines.value: the ceety haes baith private an public schools

lines.value: thare are 11 naitional schools amoont an 10 private anes dedicatit tae elementary teachin

lines.value: thare are three naitional hie schools an twa private anes

lines.value: the health center wis foondit in 1978 bi higinio mendoza an luis medina
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: aroond 15 babies are delivered each month

lines.value: atween 35 an 40 patients are seen per week an the emergency service is available 24 oors

lines.value: the instituto de previcion social ips haes a peripheral presence in the ceety

lines.value: thare are mony industries in this yung ceety
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: business include tannin an alcohol production

lines.value: some communication companies are locatit in this ceety afferin baith cellular an radial communication

lines.value: the first industry that wis established in the ceety wis the internaitional products corporation ipc slaughterhoose which wis the primary employer in san antonio an ither touns in the aurie

lines.value: foondit on mey 30 1917 it wis a slaughterhoose for cattle pigs an goats wi facilities tae prepare an refrigerate wi modren procedures

lines.value: in the first year the company exportit 73443 boxes o refrigeratit meat

lines.value: twa refrigeratit ships wur bought the paraguay an the ytororo

lines.value: a siren soondit daily at 2 am for aboot 20 minutes sae that the wirkers get ready tae begin the wirk day at 3 am

lines.value: the company haed a villa for 1400 employees wi a communal kitchen an laundry

lines.value: the ln wis introduced in 1976 as a rewirked version o peugeot's 104 z an wis pouered bi the economical 602 cc twa cylinder petrol ingine o the citroen 2cv
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: equipment levels wur law but the ln's key sellin pynts wur its cheap price an law runnin costs
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thare wis evidence o defensiveness at the press launch possibly acause a caur that leuked lik a peugeot but wis assembled at a citroen plant an fittit wi a citroen ingine shairply refutit assurances that the twa marques wad retain thair individuality
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: those assurances haed been providit bi the same press depairtments juist a few months earlier when citroen haed again run oot o money peugeot haed taken control
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: when pressed citroen explained that the ln project haed been rushed throu acause o the need tae supply customers an the [dealership] netwirk wi a model tae strengthen citroen's position at the lawer end o the mercat which wis haurdly a ringin endorsement o a range which at the time includit the ami an the dyane as well as the venerable 2cv which wad continue in production lang efter ony o the ithers
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: citroen sauld the ln in its native fraunce ae but its mair powerful replacement the lna wis introduced in november 1978 an wis exportit tae maist o the rest o europe includin richt hand drive versions for great breetain
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it haed the mair pouerful an modren 652 cc twa cylinder ingine o the citroen visa an later a 1.1 l fower cylinder ingine wis addit which haed a tap speed o nearly 90 mph 145 km h on the lna 11e an 11re
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: but lik the smawer ingined ln the lna wis cheap tae buy an cheap tae run
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: at the same time the lna wis launched its peugeot soorced bodyshell an aa spawned the talbot samba which haed square heidlichts an a different slichtly langer rear body pairt
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: lna production ceased in the simmer o 1986 while the talbot samba survived anither year
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the peugeot 104 remained in production till 1988 even tho its successor the 205 haed been launcht five years earlier
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the honda quint wis a subcompact caur manufactured bi honda motor co ltd of japan based on the honda civic
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis introduced in 1980 in japan an wis available tae export mercats includin europe an sootheast asie the follaein year
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: its export name wis honda quintet
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this model wis discontinued in 1985 an wis replaced bi the honda quint integra
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this model wis an aa sauld in australie for atween 1983 an 1985 as the rover quintet
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the caur came wi a 1602 cc fower cylinder ingine which developin 60 kilowatts 80 hp an 126 newton metres 93 ft·lbf o torque
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this ingine wis coupled wi a five speed manual transmission or an optional three speed semi automatic
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: speed sensitive pouer steerin an fully independent suspension wi macpherson struts an front an rear anti roll bars wur an aa featurt
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: jaguar rover australie retailed the honda quint in australie unner the rover quintet name frae 1983 throu 1985
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: manufactured in japan bi honda the quintet wis the first honda tae cairy the rover badge an wis replaced bi the rover 416i a rebadged version o the honda integra
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as the rover quintet the interior wood trim uised as typified the later honda based rovers made in breetain an seats wur trimmed in moquete cloth
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a pioneer stereo radio cassette wis staundart
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the banner o germany is a tricolour consistin o three equal horizontal baunds displayin the naitional colours o germany black reid an gowd
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the black red gowd tricolour first appeared in the early 19t century an achieved prominence during the 1848 revolutions
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the short lived frankfurt parliament o 1848 1850 proposed the tricolour as a banner for a unitit an democratic german state
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: wi the formation o the weimar republic efter warld war i the tricolour wis adoptit as the naitional banner o germany
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: follaein warld war ii the tricolour wis designatit as the banner o baith wast an east germany
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the twa banners wur identical till 1959 whan the east german banner wis augmentit wi the coat o airms o east germany
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: synee reunification on 3 october 1990 the black red gowd tricolour haes remained the banner o germany
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the banner o germany haes no aaways uised black red an gowd as its colours
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter the austro proushyan war in 1866 the proushyan dominatit north german confederation adoptit a tricolour o black white red as its banner
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this banner later became the banner o the german empire formed follaein the unification o germany in 1871 an wis uised till 1918
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: black white an reid wur reintroduced as the german naitional colours wi the establishment o nazi germany in 1933
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the colour schemes o black red gowd an black white red hae played an important role in the history o germany an hae haed various meanins
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the colours o the modren banner are associatit wi the republican democracy formed efter warld war ii an represent german unity an freedom no anerlie the freedom o germany but an aa the personal freedom o the german fowk
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the oreegins o the colours black red gowd lie in the freedom wars o 1813 against napoleon
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the uniforms o the lutzow free corps reflectit thir colours
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the korps consistit o students which wur risin against the occupation o germany bi the french
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thay wur a voluntary unit in the airmy an came frae aw ower germany
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thair commander wis major adolf von luetzow
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: syne thay war frae different pairts o germany an war aw wearing different coloured claes the anly possibility for them in order tae hae a uniform appearance wis tae colour thair claes black
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: additionally thay war wearing golden coloured brass buttons as well as reid trimmings
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the german relation tae black an gowd surfaced in the radical 1840's whan the black red gowd banner wis uised tae seembolise the movement against the conservative european order that wis established efter napoleon's defeat
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the frankfurt parliament haed declared the black red gowd as the offeecial colours o the german confederation wi the reid in the tricolour maist likely referencin the hanseatic league an the gowd an black seembolisin austrick as its empire considered tae be german haed an influence ower what wad acome soothren germany
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thare are mony theories in circulation regardin the oreegins o the colour scheme utilized in the 1848 banner
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it haes been proposed that the colours wur those o the jena student's league ane o the radically mindit burschenschaften banned bi metternich in the carlsbad decrees
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: anither claim goes back tae the uniforms mainly black wi reid facins an gowd buttons o the lutzow free corps comprisin maistly varsity students an formed durin the struggle against the occupyin forces o napoleon
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is durin the mid nineteent century that reid became seenonymous wi revolution an karl marx's socialist vision
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: whaiver the true explanation thir colours suin came tae be regardit as the naitional colours o germany durin this brief period an especially efter thair reintroduction durin the weimar period thay hae acome seenonymous wi leeberalism in general
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: breda () is a municipality an a ceety in the soothren pairt o the netherlands
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the name breda derived frae brede aa broad aa an refers tae the confluence o the rivers mark an aa
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as a fortified ceety the ceety wis a strategic military an poleetical significance
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: awtho a direct fiefdom o the holy roman emperor the ceety obtained a municipal chairter the acquisition o breda throu marriage bi the hoose o nassau ensured that breda wad be at the centre o poleetical an social life in the law kintras
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: breda's urban aurie is hame tae an estimatit 316000 fowk 2008
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: breda is twinned wi
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the mitsubishi lancer is a family caur biggit bi mitsubishi motors
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it haes been ken as the colt lancer dodge/plymouth colt chrysler valiant lancer chrysler lancer eagle summit hindustan lancer soueast lioncel mitsubishi carisma an mitsubishi mirage in various kintras at different times an haes been sauld as the galant fortis in japan syne 2007
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it haes an aa been sauld as lancer fortis in taiwan wi a different facelift compared tae galant fortis

lines.value: coventry ( or ) is a ceety an metropolitan borough in the coonty o wast midlands in ingland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: coventry is the 9t lairgest ceety in ingland an the 11t lairgest in the unitit kinrick
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is an aa the seicont lairgest ceety in the inglis midlands efter birmingham wi a population o 300848 awtho baith leicester an nottingham hae lairger urban auries
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the population o coventry haes risen tae 309800 as o 2008
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: coventry is situatit 95 miles 153 km northwast o lunnon an 19 miles 31 km east o birmingham an is further frae the coast than ony ither ceety in breetain
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: awtho harbourin a population o amaist a third o a million indwallers coventry is no amangst the inglis core ceeties group due tae its proximity tae birmingham
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: coventry wis the warld's first twin ceety whan it formed a twinnin relationship wi the roushie ceety o stalingrad nou volgograd during warld war ii
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the relationship developed throu ordinary fowk in coventry who wantit tae shaw thair support for the soviet red airmy durin the battle o stalingrad
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ceety is nou an aa twinned wi dresden lidice an wi 26 ither ceeties aroond the warld
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: coventry cathedral is ane o the newer cathedrals in the warld haein been biggit follaein the warld war ii bombin o the auncient cathedral bi the luftwaffe
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: coventry motor companies hae contributit significantly taeo the breetish motor industry an it haes twa varsities the ceety centre based coventry university an the university o warwick on the soothern ootskirts
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: coventry first twinned wi volgograd roushie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter warld war ii coventry twinned wi dresden as an act o peace an reconciliation baith ceeties haein been vera hivily bombed durin the war
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: each twin ceety kintra is representit in a specific ward o the ceety an in each ward haes a peace gairden dedicatit tae that twin ceety
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: coventry is nou twinned wi 26 places athort the warld
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: scotland gaelic alba inglis scotland is a kintra in nor wast europe an is ane o the fower kintras that maks the unitit kinrick
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it taks up the northren thrid o the breetish island
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: scotland haes til its sooth the laund o ingland an is bund bi the german ocean til the eist an the atlantic ocean til the north an wast
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it aforetyms wis a free kinrik but than scotland gaed intil a union wi ingland in 1603 whan jeams vi o scotland becam jeams i o ingland eftir the daith o elspeth i this union wis makkit formal on 1 mey 1707 bi the treatie o union
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the scots pairlament wis gotten rid o on 26 mairch
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the union southert baith kinriks makkin the kinrick o great breetain wi a new singil pairlament haudden in wastmeinster lunnon but sum pairts o scotland's institutions merkit the laund's naitional kirk an skuilin an legal seistems wis hauden apairt
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1801 scotland becam ane o the thrie launds o the unitit kinrick alang wi ingland an ireland nou juist northren ireland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: wales is nou seen for uisal as anither laund awtho it wis juist a principalitie o the kinrik o ingland in 1707
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1997 the scots fowk voted ti hae a new pairlament estaiblisht bi the uk govrenment in the scotland act 1998
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the nou devolv'd scots pairlament haes been gien the pouer ti govren the laund on maist scots maiters but haesna ower mukkil pouer wi taxes awtho it dis hae the pouer ti chynge the uk incum tax rate bi 3p in the poond
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: scotland's size is maistlie that estaiblisht bi the 1237 twato york atwein scotland an ingland an the 1266 treatie o perth atwein scotland an norawa
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: exceptions is the isle o mann that is nou a croun dependencie ootwi the unitit kinrick orkney an shetland that is nou scots raither nor dens an barwick that wis defined as subjek til the laws o ingland bi the 1746 wales an barwick act
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the patron saunt o scotland is saunt andra an st andra's day is on 30 november but it haesna been mukkil celebratit syn the reformation
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the wird scot wis taen frae the laitin an its uiss micht weil date fae aboot the first hauf o the 10t yeirhunder whan it first kyth'd in the anglo saxon chronicle an harkent til the laund o the gaels analogous til the laitin scotia
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ither name is caledonia whilk is gien ti sum pairts o the new warld an colonies lyk new caledonia
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: scots keengs adoptit the teetil basileus/rex scottorum = heich keeng/keeng o the gaels basileus meinin sovrein in the greek an rex meinin keeng in the laitin an rex scotiae keeng o gael land sum tym in the 11t yeirhunder lyklie swee'd bi the styl imperator scottorum kent ti hae been uis'd bi brian boruma in ireland in 1005
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in modren tyms the wird scot is uis'd equalie for aw indwallers nae maiter wha thair forebeirs wis this is acause the kintra his haed a ceivic raither nor a singil kin orientation for maist o the last thoosan yeir
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: repeat'd glaciations that kiver'd the hail laund mass o modren scotland hae malafouster'd onie traces that thar micht hae been o bodies bidin thon afore the mesolithic period
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is thocht that the first post glacial groups o hunter gaitherers winned til scotland aboot 12800 yeir aby as the ice sheet retreat'd eftir the last glaciation
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: groups o sattilers begoud biggin the first kent lestie hooses on scots yird aboot 9500 yeir aby an the first clachans aboot 6000 yeir aby
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the weil haint clachan o skara brae on the mainlaund o orkney dates frae this tym
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: neolithic dwallin birrial an ritual steids ar gey common an weil haint in the northren isles an wastren isles whaur want o trees led ti maist biggins bein biggit oot o local stane
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the written protohistorie o scotland begoud wi the incumin o the roman empire in soothren an central gret breetain whan the romans occupee'd whit is nou ingland an wales admeinisterin it as a province cried britannia
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: roman invasions an occupations o soothren scotland war a series o breif interludes
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 83 4 ad the general gnaeus julius agricola baet the caledonians at the battil o mons graupius an roman forts war breiflie set alang the gask rig naur til the hieland lyn nane ar kent ti hae been biggit ayont that
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thrie yeir eftir the battil the roman airmies haed resiled til the soothren uplands
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thay pit up hadrian's waw for ti haud in the tribes on baith syds o the waw an the limes britannicus becam the northren laundmairch o the empire awtho the airmie hauden on til the antonine waw in the middil lawlands for twa short periods the hindmaist o thaim wis durin the tym o emperor septimius severus frae 208 till 210
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the amoont o roman militar occupation o onie significant pairt o scotland wis boond til a tot o aboot 40 yeir awtho thair swee on the soothren bit o the kintra occupee'd bi brythonic tribes sic as the votadini an damnonii wad still hae been conseiderabil
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it the vera beginnin o the early medieval time thare wur nae angles nor anly saxons nor een ony vikings juist yet
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the land the romans caad caledonia thare wur mainly juist the pechts an mibbe a wee bit frae the north pairts o hibernia as the romans haed caad it

lines.value: thare's monitor whit uist tae think the irish cam ainer in muckle numers

lines.value: in reality archaeological evidence maks it clear that an elite cam ower

lines.value: thare few indeed

lines.value: we're as well tae think in terms o jist a few thousan it maist

lines.value: as elites tho sicweys influence wis great on the local population

lines.value: sae the pictish tongue retreats frae argyle as weel as frae the sooth o the lothian

lines.value: in 1603 jeams vi keeng o scots inherit'd the throne o the kinrick o ingland an becam keeng jeams i o ingland an left edinburgh for lunnon
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: apairt frae a short tyd unner the protectorate scotland stey'd a sinder state but thar wis guid pukil fechtin atwein the croun an the covenanters ower the furm o kirk govrenment
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: eftir the glorious revolution the aboleition o episkopacie an the dingin doun o the roman catholic jeams vii bi weelum an mairie scotland breiflie shored ti wale a different protestant monarch frae ingland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1707 the scots pairlament an the pairlament o ingland enakit the twin acts o union that led ti scotland's formal incorporation intil the kinrick o great breetain

lines.value: the deponed jacobite stuart claimants haed stey'd popular in the hielands an nor'eist in parteicular amangst non presbyterians
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: houaniver twa mukkil jacobite uprisins lench'd in 1715 an 1745 failt ti remuive the hoose o hanover frae the breetish throne

lines.value: the threit o the jacobite muivement til the unitit kinrick an its monarchs effekivlie endit at the battil o culloden great breetain's last pitchit battil
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the baetin o the jacobite's at thon battil paved the wey for lairge skale remuivals o the indwallers o the hielands an islands kent as the hieland clearances
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the scots enlightenment an the industrial revolution makkit scotland intil an intellectual commercial an industrial pouerhouss
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: eftir seicont warld weir scotland tholed an industrial dwynin that wis parteicular dour

lines.value: anerlie in raicent decades haes the kintra enjoy'd sumthing o a cultural an economic renaissance

lines.value: economic factors that hae contribute til this rekiverie include a resurgent financial services industrie electronics manufacturin see silicon glen an the german ocean ayl an gas industrie

lines.value: follaein a referendum on devolution proposals in 1997 the scotland act 1998 wis passt bi the unitit kinrick pairlament for til estaiblish a devolv'd scots pairlament

lines.value: in 2011 the scottis naitional pairtie wun an oweraw majority in pairlament an intends tae haud a referendum oan unthirldom in the hairst o 2014

lines.value: ::'for ian mcewan's 2005 novel see saturday novel setturday is the day o the week atween friday an sunday

lines.value: bi tradeetion comin fae the auncient jews setturday is the hindmaist day o the week

lines.value: that convention remains universallie standard i the united states bit in modnen europe mony fowks nou think o setturday as the saxt forelast day o the week an sunday the last

lines.value: the modren european convention haes been makkit formal bi iso 8601

lines.value: on the ither haund in mony islamic kintras setturdays is the first day o the week wi fridays as holidays

lines.value: eastren orthodox kirks distinguish atween the saabath setturday an the lord's day sunday

lines.value: in mony kintras whaur sundays are holidays setturday is pairt o the weekend an is tradeetionallie a day o restin

lines.value: airdrieonians football club forbye cried the daimants is a profeesional fitbaw club frae the toun o airdrie in north lanrikshire
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is a member o the scottish professional football league an is nou in scottish league one
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: airdrie unitit wis formed in mey 2002 efter the deith o airdrieonians
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: airdrieonians haed feenished seicont in the first diveesion in the 2001/02 saison but efter monie year o siller problems thay dee'd wi dets o mair nor £2 million
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the deith o the auld airdrie left a place in the scots fitbaw league in the third diveesion an local aidrie man an airdrieonians fan jim ballantyne attemptit wi the aid o ithers tae get intae the leage wi a team cawed airdrie unitit that wis mair or less a rebirth o airdrieonians
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: but thair application wis rejectit in favour o the inglis unibond team gretna
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as a last resort ballantyne bocht oot strugglin diveesion twa side clydebank an wi the sfl's aye sayin the club wis remuived tae airdrie the sarks wis chynged tae leuk lik thaim o aidrieonians an the name wis chynged tae airdrie unitit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: airdrie unitit's first saison stairtit wi a hame gemme agin farfar athleatic whilk the daimons won 1-0 wi a goal bi caiptain stephen docherty
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: maugre a puir stairt tae the saison the club endit weel as striker jerome vareille led thaim tae a promotion chailenge at the end o the saison
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thay didna achieve the promotion as a late goal frae brechin ceety agin hamilton accies saw thaim tak seicont place aheid o airdrie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ane o the hielichts o the saison wis dingin spl side kilmarnock oot o the cis cup awa on the penalties
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: airdrie unitit's first an sae faur anely trophy cam in the 2002/03 saison anely the club's seicont saison that thay wan the seicont diveesion in an war promotit tae the first diveesion
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: airdrie wan the trophy whan efter a gey puir stairt tae the saison thay lostna in the last aichteen gemmes the last bein agin umwhile leaders morton wha eventually endit fowert whan the diamonts teuk the trophy efter a 2-0 win in front o a croud o mair nor 5000 still the club's record for a league gemme tho the league haed in fact been wan the week afore wi a 1-0 win awa tae alloa wi club hero owen coyle scorin his 100rt airdrie goal tae clinch the teetle
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: afore this airdrie unitit haed reached the final o the bell's chailenge cup but eis beaten 2-0 bi first diveesion inverness caledonian thristle
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in airdrie unitit's first saison in the scots first diveesion thay endit up 5t a poseetion whilk wes mair nae maist o thair supporters wad hae jaloused lylkey
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the club lost monie plyers in the simmer o 2005 an went intae the 2005/06 saison wi nae muckle expectation o gettin the same poseetion again bot thay still managed tae finish a no bad 6t
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in this saison the club recordit a 7-0 win ower dundee at hame whilk still staunds as the club's record victorie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: on november 13 2006 sandy stewart wes sackit frae his poseetion o manager efter ower fower year in charge o the club due tae monie poor gemmes an the fack that club hadnae been abuin 8t a saison
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wes succeeded bi ex airdrieonians plyer an airdrie unitit coach kenny black fower days latter
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: black hed been a coach at leicester city in ingland sen 2004 an this wes hi first managerial post in senior fitba tho he hed been in charge o the fitba team at the varsity o edinburgh aforehaund
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: despite sum sines o a late rallie black didnae inspire the daimons tae onie grate extent an thay endit up 9t in the league leavin thame in the scots league play aff poseetion
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thay wad need tae win the play aff tae stai in the first diveesion
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thay got aff tae a guid start dingin brechin city wi an aggregate score o 6-1
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: bot in the finil thay wer puir castin awa a 2-0 lead in the lest five meenits o the first leg agin stirling albion an lost the hame gemme 3-2 sicweys gien airdrie unitit thair first relegation in thair gey short history
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: airdrie unitit play thair hame gemmes at new bruimfield pairk in airdrie as the fans caa it tho it is offeeshally kent as exelsior stadium the noo deid airdrieonians auld pairk briumfield tho in the lang syne thay hed plyed at mavisbank wes sauld tae supermerket chyne safeway sen then takken ower bi wm morrison wha wer gien permission tae big a new store on the site

lines.value: it is generally jaloused that is wes this transaction whilk startit the siller proablems o airdrieonians as thair auld groond wes demolished sum yeirs afore the new ane wes gien persmisson tae be bigged

lines.value: the yeirs awa frae airdrie in whilk the club groond shared at braidwood stadium cummernaud wi cylde fc resultit in the siller frae the sellin o bruimfield whilk wes tae be uised tae pey fer the biggin o the new groond wes wastit

lines.value: the ottoman empire kent offeecially as sublime ottoman state ottoman turkis دَوْلَتِ عَلِيّهٔ عُثمَانِیّه devlet i ʿaliyye-yi ʿo s maniyye modren turkis yuce osmanli devleti or osmanli i̇mparatorlugu wis an empire that lastit frae 1299 tae 1923

lines.value: jujiro matsuda 松田重次郎|matsuda jujiro august 8 1875 mairch 9 1952 wis a japanese industrialist an businessman who foondit automaker mazda motor corporation
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the son o a fisherman jujiro matsuda wis born in hiroshima
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis apprenticed tae a blacksmith in osaka at the age o fowerteen an invented the matsuda type pump in 1906
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: later he teuk ower management o the foundry at which he apprenticed an changed the name o the organisation tae matsuda pump partnership he wis forced oot o his company but stairtit an armament manufacturer suin efter the eponymously named matsuda works
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: matsuda wad see his fledgling company's fortunes improve when it wis commissioned as a supplier tae the tsar o roushie as well as manufacturing the type 99 rifle for the japanese military
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: bi 1921 jujiro matsuda wis a wealthy man thanks tae his previous business ventures
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he moved back tae hiroshima when he wis asked tae tak ower management o floundering artificial cork manufacturer which wis placed intae receivership bi its creditors when the mercat for artificial cork dried up follaein the end o warld war i the unprofitable cork business ceased an matsuda focused on tuil manufacturing
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: 1931 oversaw the introduction o the mazdago motorized tricycle manufactured in what is nou fuchu ceety an the company nou kent as toyo kogyo co ltd 東洋工業株式会社|toyo kogyo kabushiki gaisha wad set its focus on motor vehicle manufacturin
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the toyo kogyo headquarters saw hivy damage on august 6 1945 upon the bombing o hiroshima
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the fuchu ceety plant 5.3 kilometers frae the site o the explosion wis left relatively unscathed an matsuda offered its uise for the hiroshima bureau o nhk
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: matsuda wis na accused o bein nor wis he charged as a war conspirator an a revitalized toyo kogyo wis the main force behind repairing the damaged economy o hiroshima follaein warld war ii
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1950 toyo kogyo providit startup for a basebaa team the hiroshima carp
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his adoptit son in law tsuneji matsuda succeeded him as preses o toyo kogyo an oversaw the expansion o its automobile division until 1979 when ford motor company teuk a 25% equity stake in toyo kogyo
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the alliance wi ford led tae the divestiture o shares frae the matsuda faimily an the chynge o toyo kogyo intae mazda motor corporation in 1984

lines.value: the matsuda faimily still awns a controlling interest in the hiroshima toyo carp
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: matsuda dee'd on mairch 9 1952

lines.value: excavations at tell as sawda an tell al ansari juist sooth o the auld ceety o aleppo shaw that the aurie wis occupee'd syne at least the latter pairt o the 3rd millennium bc an this is an aa whan aleppo is first mentioned in cuneiform tablets unearthed in ebla an mesopotamie in which it is notit for its commercial an military proficiency

lines.value: the global distribution o tods thegither wi thair widespread reputation for cunning haes contreibutit tae thair prominence in popular culture an folklore in mony societies aroond the warld

lines.name: Scots

lines.value: guatemala ceety in full la nueva guatemala de la asuncion locally kent as guatemala or guate is the caipital an lairgest ceety o the republic o guatemala
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is an aa the caipital ceety o the local guatemala depairtment an the lairgest ceety in central americae
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ceety is locatit at in a muntain valley cawed valle de la ermita in the sooth central pairt o the kintra
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: athin the confines o modren guatemala ceety is the auncient maya ceety o kaminaljuyu
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: kaminaljuyu wis first occupied atween 1200 an 1000 bc an the ceety continued tae be inhabitit for aboot 2000 years afore it wis abandoned in the late classic period o mesoamerican chronology 600–900 ad
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is ane of americae's maist notable archaeological steids
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the centre o kaminaljuyu wis locatit a short distance frae the auldest pairt o guatemala ceety

lines.value: housomeivver in the late 20t century the ceety grew aroond the ruins an in some cases ower some o the ootlyin ruins afore thay wur protectit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: mony o the several hunder temple mounds hae been biggit ower wi freeways shoppin centres commerce luxury hotels an residential auries
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the central ceremonial centre o kaminaljuyu wis housomeivver protectit bi the guatemalan govrenment an is nou a pairk athin the ceety
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thare are an aa mony ruins still in existence protectit bi the govrenment
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in spainyie colonial times guatemala ceety wis a sma toun
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it haed a monastery cawed el carmen foondit in 1629
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the caipital o the spainyie captaincy general o guatemala coverin maist o modren central americae wis muived here efter a series o earthquakes the santa marta earthquakes that stairtit on 29 julie 1773 destroyed the auld caipital antigua guatemala
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: on 27 september 1775 keeng charles iii o spain officialised the muivin o the caipital
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this dramatically increased the potential for expansion o the ceety
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: guatemala ceety wis the scene o the declaration o unthirldom o central americae frae spain an became the caipital o the federal republic o central americae in 1821
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: guatemala ceety is the economic govrenmental an cultural caipital o the republic
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ceety an aa functions as the main port o entry intae the kintra wi internaitional airport la aurora internaitional airport an maist major hieweys in the kintra oreeginatin or leadin tae the ceety
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in addition tae a wide variety o restaurants hotels an shops the ceety haes a wide variety o airt galleries theatres sports venues an museums includin some fine collections o pre columbie airt an continually affers an increasin amoont o cultural activities
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: guatemala ceety affers aw the modren amenities alang wi important historic steids that a warld cless ceety can be expectit tae hae rangin frae an imax theatre tae the icaro film festival festival icaro featurin film producit in guatemala an central americae
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ceety continues tae be a pole for the attraction o immigrants frae the kintra's rural auries as well as foreign immigrants

lines.value: despite its location in the tropics an the mony micro climates foond athin the kintra guatemala ceety's elevation an the resultin moderating influence o the heicher altitude enable it tae enjoy a subtropical hieland climate koppen cwb tho dependin on location it borders on a tropical savanna climate koppen aw an aw
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: guatemala ceety is generally mild amaist springlike throuoot the course o the year

lines.value: the rainy saison extends frae mey tae october while the dry saison covers the remainder o the year

lines.value: guatemala ceety is subdividit intae 22 zones designed bi the urban ingineerin o raul aguilar batres each ane wi its awn streets an avenues makkin it pretty easy tae find addresses in the ceety
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: zones are nummered 1-25 wi zones 20 22 an 23 no existin as thay wad hae fawen in twa ither municipalities territory
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: addresses are assigned accordin tae the street or avenue nummer follaeed bi a dash an the nummer o metres it is awa frae the intersection further simplifeein address location

lines.value: the zones are assigned in a spiral form stairtin in dountoun guatemala ceety

lines.value: the ceety's metro aurie haes recently grown vera rapidly an haes absorbit maist o the neebourin municipalities o villa nueva san miguel petapa mixco san juan sacatepequez san jose pinula santa catarina pinula fraijanes san pedro ayampuc amatitlan villa canales palencia an chinautla formin wha is nou kent as the guatemala ceety metropolitan aurie

lines.value: zone ane is the historic centre centro historico lyin in the vera hert o the ceety the location o mony important historic biggins includin the palacio nacional de la cultura naitional palace o cultur the metropolitan cathedral the naitional congress the casa presidencial presidential hoose the naitional librar an plaza de la constitucion constitution plaza auld central pairk
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efforts tae revitalize this important pairt o the ceety hae been unnertaken bi the municipal govrenment an hae been vera successfu sicweys far

lines.value: in an attempt tae control rapid growthe o the ceety the municipal govrenment municipalidad de guatemala heidit bi langtime mayor alvaro arzu haes implementit a plan tae control its growthe based on transects alang its important airterial roads an exhibittin transit orientit development tod characteristics
